name: Starry Dreams
description:
In Starry Dreams, you play as a new resident of Sunflower Apartments, where you meet several interesting characters- two of which who want to open their own bakery! As the story progresses, the success of the bakery hinges on whether or not the player is good enough friends with the characters.

Features:

  • 6 interact-able characters
  • Multiple locations to visit with different randomized events at each location
  • 4 characters have multiple outfits
  • 2 non-binary main characters (Frederika and Marion)
  • A cute lesbian couple (Licellia and Bricie)
  • Animated indicators of "bad"/"good" decisions

Credits:

  • Art, writing, programming, and GUI - Mikomi Kisomi (me!)
  • Music - Alcaknight under the Creative Commons license
  • Font - Delius by Natalia Raices
  • Engine - Ren'Py

Miko speaking here. Starry Dreams was the first VN I ever started working on, way back in 2014 when I didn't even know how to properly use flags. Safe to say, I've come a long way since then! I'm glad to finally get this out and share it with you guys. Feel free to tell me who your favorite character is or do Let's Plays of this!
